# Generated by: iprm (v0.1.0)
# Generated on: 2025-02-25 03:32:38 UTC
# Platform: Windows
# =========================================================
add_library(tp_lemon INTERFACE)
add_dependencies(tp_lemon
	tp_lemon_unpack_header_archive
)

target_include_directories(tp_lemon
	INTERFACE
		${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Archive/./include

)

set(extract_dir "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Archive")
set(archive_file "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lemon-1.3.1.tar.gz")
set(sentinel_file ${extract_dir}/tp_lemon_unpack_header_archive_unpack_archive.sentinel)

add_custom_command(
	OUTPUT
		${sentinel_file}
		${archive_output_files}
	DEPENDS ${archive_file}
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${extract_dir}
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E tar xzf ${archive_file}
	COMMENT "Unpacking ${archive_file} to ${extract_dir}"
	COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E touch ${sentinel_file}
	WORKING_DIRECTORY ${extract_dir}
	VERBATIM
	COMMAND_EXPAND_LISTS
)

add_custom_target(tp_lemon_unpack_header_archive DEPENDS ${sentinel_file})
